system.description:
Time: 15−RSI Seconds+Ritual: Chant
Range: Self/RSI hexes+Duration: One Touch or Impact

A ball of mundane fire appears in the invoker’s hand for Duration. It may be used to burn a victim touched, or may be cast as a low velocity missile up to Range by using the Missile Combat system. The fireball vanishes after impact. Fire impact for touch/fireball is 3d6 (MS) or 5d6 (CS).

 

CF: Fireball explodes in cleric’s hand, causing 3d6 fire impact to 1d6 randomly generated body parts.
